title: Miscellany
author: Gikatilla, Joseph ben Abraham
description: Contents: Mosheh ben Yehudah ben Mosheh, Index to Maimonides' Guide for the Perplexed (ff. 1r-6r). Sefer musar (ff. 6v-22r). Alphabet of Ben Sira (ff. 22v-30r). Midrash le-ʿolam and Midrash gadol (ff. 30v-36r). Isaac ben Abraham ibn Latif, Igeret ha-teshuvah (ff. 36v-37r). Commentary on the Writings (Proverbs) (ff. 38r-46v). Moses Ibn Ezra, ʿArugat ha-bosem (fragments) (ff. 46v-71v). Judah ben Eliʿezer, Minḥat Yehudah (ff. 73r-129v). Miscellaneous texts (ff. 130r-151v). Mordekhai ..., Philosophical treatise (152r-166v). Judah ben Solomon ha-Kohen Matkah, Midrash ha-ḥokhmah (ff. 166v-175r). Abraham bar Hiyya Savasorda, Higayon ha-nefesh ha-ʿatsuvah (ff. 175v-183r). Barayta de-Yosef ben Uziʾel (ff. 183r-187v). Baḥya ben Asher ben Ḥlava's Kad ha-ḳemaḥ (ff. 188r-210v, but f. 195 blank): ʻInyan ha-Yiḥud (f. 202). Kaṿanat ha-Lev (ff. 203-204v). ʻIḳar Metsiʼut ha-Shem (ff. 204v-210r). Miscellany (ff. 210v-215v). Joseph ben Abraham Gikatilla, Sefer ha-meshalim (ff. 216r-245v). Seder shivat kokhave lekhet (ff. 246r-249r).
